<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/user/courses"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Gets a list of all courses associated with the authenticated user

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>

>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successfully retrieved user courses","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"course_id":{"type":"integer","description":"Unique identifier for the course"},"course_name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the course"},"assistant":{"description":"Assistant associated with the course (optional)","type":"object","properties":{"_id":{"type":"string","description":"Unique identifier for the assistant"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the assistant"},"picture_url":{"type":"string","description":"URL to the assistant's picture"}},"title":"Assistant"},"history_count":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of dialogue entries in the course history"},"last_dialogue_date":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"ISO timestamp of the last dialogue in the course"}},"title":"Course"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - Invalid or missing access token"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
